radiographic_examinations.findings: The heart is enlarged. The liver demonstrates homogeneous attenuation with no focal lesions, no biliary dilatation, and a small amount of free fluid. The pancreas has normal attenuation with no focal lesions or ductal dilatation. The spleen, adrenal glands, kidneys, stomach, and small bowel loops are unremarkable. Extensive diverticulosis is noted. There are calcified fibroids in the uterus with no adnexal masses. No lymphadenopathy is observed. Moderate atherosclerotic disease is present. No osseous lesions or acute fractures are noted.
